name: Avoid Subroutines with more than X lines of code  (RPG400)
description:
This rule searches all the subroutines having more than X  lines of code.
X is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Subroutines with more than X lines of code.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Subroutine full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there the subroutines are not too big.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have subroutines with less than X lines of code.
